name: BlackSky-MD
description: Best whatsapp bot developed by BlackSky

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your number , dont put '+' and put your area code

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code
